songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oo, Ooo
Ooo, Ooooo
Ooo, listen

[Verse]
You are very special
You're special too
Everyone is special
This I know is true
When I look at you
You are, huh, you're very special
And you're special too
You're special too
Everyone
I'm talking everyone is special
This I know is true
When I look at you
When I look at you

Cause everyone is special
This I know is true
When I look at you
Yeah, yeah you know you special
Cause you were born
As yourself
And no one else
With no one to help
Except for your mama and daddy

[Outro]
Please believe that shit
You're very special
[?] Big Baby D.R.A.M
Please stay tuned
songs.title: Special
